meanings.definition: A false or baseless rumor or belief.
meanings.sent1: The canard about aliens invading Earth spread quickly.
meanings.sent2: Don't believe every canard you hear about celebrities.
meanings.sent3: The canard that eating carrots gives you superpowers is quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: She dismissed the canard that black cats bring bad luck.
meanings.sent5: The canard that lightning never strikes the same place twice is simply untrue.
